verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ary, ankoatra ary,
Fanantenana soa.
Fonena-mamy doria
Fanantenana soa.
Ao hihaonantsika indray
Eo anatrehan'ny Ray,
Sambatra mandrakizay
Fanantenana soa.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ary, tapitra tokoa,
Fanantenana soa.
Tomany sy sento koa,
Fanantenana soa.
'Ndreny mamiratra ery
'Reo volamena ary :
Lapa tsy fahita ety,
Fanantenana soa.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Henoy, feo manako re,
Fanantenana soa.
Mireona toa rano be
Fanantenana soa !
Lokanga tsara feo,
Miharo antsa, maneho ;
Lavi-tsento sy toreo
Fanantenana soa.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ary, tsy ho ela izao,
Handray ilay lova ao,
Fanantenana soa.
Kristy avy indray
hampody antsika amin-dRay
Eny, ho mandrakizay !
He, fanantenana soa !
Fanantenana soa.
